&GroupName=腾讯深圳员工库
&FaceModelVersion=3.0

&Tag=不含实习生

&GroupExDescriptions.2=组名
&<公共请求参数>

&PersonExDescriptionInfos.1.PersonExDescriptionIndex=1

&PersonExDescriptionInfos.2.PersonExDescriptionIndex=2
